description_for_human: Professional resume and portfolio of Hamin Lee, a Full Stack Engineer specializing in Web, On-device LLM, Real-time Streaming, and Robotics.
description_for_model: This is the professional resume and portfolio website of Hamin Lee, a Full Stack Engineer from South Korea. He specializes in web development (React, Next.js, Vue, TypeScript), on-device AI/LLM, real-time streaming (WebRTC), and robotics. Current CTO at POUL Inc., previously worked at Abacus Technology and Metamorp. Has multiple open-source projects on NPM. Available for full-stack development, technical leadership, and AI/ML engineering positions.
